Expand your IAP options by adding a customized product, that will offer your players something different than digital items, Without any cost from you.

PlushTap collaborates with you to design, sell, promote, and produce a unique product that fit in your game for your users üòé The best part? It's risk-free, with no investment required!.

1. DESIGN

First, our designer makes a model. The customized plushie will look just like your game character, and we pay close attention to all the little details to make a special product that can fit inside your game. üé®‚úç

2. LAUNCH

Once the prototype is approved, we kick off making the merchandise, the merchandise production will start at a scale, depends on the size of your game community. üî•

3. SDK

3- Within your game, players can easily buy the product inside the game through our SDK. A payment gateway will appear, equipped with all the necessary functions for a smooth process, without the need for the Unity billing system. üì≤üö©

4. SHIP

After making a purchase, the product will be shipped directly to the customer. Delivery times may vary, typically ranging from 7 to 15 business days based on the destination country and city.üööüì¶
